content: the crochet octopus ornament is a playful adornment for your christmas tree - without the slime featuring bernat maker minis this tiny tentacled hanging crochet christmas tree ornament or present topper is full of fun the octopus is often associated with intelligence adaptability intuition and creativity since they often can blend in or camouflage themselves they can symbolize the importance of being adaptable and flexible octopuses can regenerate lost limbs conveying a message of resilience and healing or bouncing back from adversity i knew there was a reason i loved these creatures do you know someone who could use a little celebration or encouragement the crochet octopus ornament is a playful adornment for your christmas tree - without the slime featuring bernat maker minis this tiny tentacled hanging crochet christmas tree ornament or present topper is full of fun the octopus is often associated with intelligence adaptability intuition and creativity since they often can blend in or camouflage themselves they can symbolize the importance of being adaptable and flexible octopuses can regenerate lost limbs conveying a message of resilience and healing or bouncing back from adversity i knew there was a reason i loved these creatures do you know someone who could use a little celebration or encouragement
